channel.title: My Cyber Security Leaning Path
channel.description: Recent content on My Cyber Security Leaning Path

item.description: I’ve been working on IT since 2017. Back than, I started maintaing Linux server in production environments and managing/troubleshooting network; My school was running an infrastructure with 3COM switches connected through Optical Fibers and running VMs on a old IBM x3650 M3 (BTW, this old server is now my HomeLab… lol). I had to reconstruct the whole network infrastructure using VLANs for accessing controls for different devices/people and everything was managed through a virtual Router/Firewall; Yes, I know… there is a better and modern way to do it;
